name: Exit Limbo: Opening
description:
The Game


Exit Limbo is a neo-retro side-scrolling beat ’em up with adventure elements.

Featuring an innovative combat system with unique gameplay and fighting mechanics,
it has memorable and wacky enemies in a truly unique visual art style.

Features


- 2D side-scroller beat’em up / brawler with unique combo moves.
- 6 Enemy Types
- 2 Bosses
- 4 interconnected macro-areas to explore with 2 challenging puzzle sequences
- 3 Environmental traps to use during battle
- 2 Special moves and 1 weapon to unlock
- Enemies drop in-game currency to spend in the shop
- 1 Shop to buy hp refills and ammo
